mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS id, t.concurrency_version AS concurrencyVersion, t.job_number AS jobNumber, t.real_name AS realName, t.is_male AS isMale, t.login_name AS loginName, t.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, t.contact_phone AS contactPhone, t.work_phone AS workPhone, t.type AS type, t.email AS email, t.birthday AS birthday, t.age AS age, t.entry_date AS entryDate, t.leave_date AS leaveDate, t.mobile AS mobile, t.remark AS remark, t.STATUS AS STATUS, t.create_date AS createDate, t.update_date AS updateDate, t.create_person_id AS createPersonId, t.create_person_name AS createPersonName, t.update_person_id AS updatePersonId, t.update_person_name AS updatePersonName, t.create_org_id AS createOrgId, t.create_org_name AS createOrgName, t.create_company_id AS createCompanyId, t.create_company_name AS createCompanyName, t.delflag AS delflag, t.belong_org_id AS belongOrgId, t.worktime AS workTime, t.disabletime AS disableTime, t.wechat AS weChat, t.sort AS sort, t.disabled_id AS disabledId, t.email_pwd AS emailPwd, t.tend_id AS tendId from pt_sys_org_user t where not exists (SELECT trial.user_id from pt_sys_org_user_trial trial LEFT JOIN pt_sys_org_user u on u.id = trial.user_id where trial.due_time > now() and u.delflag = 0 and u.`status` = 1 ) and t.delflag = 0 and t.`status` = 1 LIMIT 1;
